summary: Heldorado is an annual parade celebrating Las Vegas as a frontier town. Roy is captain of the guards at Boulder Dam. He helps celebrate the town's anniversary while capturing racketeers involved with the local casinos.
cast: Roy Rogers|Trigger|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Dale Evans|Paul Harvey|Brad Dexter|John Bagni|John Phillips|Malcolm 'Bud' McTaggart|Rex Lease|Steve Darrell|Doye O'Dell|LeRoy Mason|Charles Williams|Eddie Acuff|Bob Nolan|Sons of the Pioneers|Pat Brady|Tim Spencer|Hugh Farr|Karl Farr|Lloyd Perryman|Phil Arnold|Sam Ash|Joaquin Bascou|Virginia Carroll|George Chandler|Tex Cooper|Bobbie Dorree|Shug Fisher|Frank Henry|Eddie Kane|Walter Lawrence|Frank McGrath|Clayton Moore|Victor Potel|Keith Richards|Tom Smith|Jack Sparks|Tex Terry|Emmett Vogan Jr.|Bill Yrigoyen|Joe Yrigoyen
title: Heldorado
